assessment_templates.title: Visual Evidence Draft – Failure Mode Cluster
assessment_templates.description: Organize representative samples into failure clusters such as Lever Arm Instability or Topology Trap.

assessment_templates.title: Deep Dive Diagnostic – Triad Analysis
assessment_templates.description: Intensive inspection of a single sample by comparing raw inputs, algorithm output, and discrepancy analysis.

assessment_templates.title: A/B Regression Test – Baseline vs Experiment
assessment_templates.description: Side-by-side comparison to highlight how a new algorithm regresses versus the baseline.

assessment_templates.title: Interim Run Log – Negative Result
assessment_templates.description: Structured interim assessment focused on failure-mode migration and next steps when success rate is low or unchanged.
